data.lyric:
[ti:Sincerely (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Sincerely, Kentrell (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sincerely (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:01.57]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/David McDowell/Cameron Hubler/Jaidyn Hullum/Jason Goldberg
[00:03.15]Dmac on the f**kin' track
[00:04.28]I woke up I woke up I ain't man
[00:05.56]Ayy Cameron you the man now
[00:07.00]
[00:08.70]Sometimes I don't even wanna talk
[00:09.83]
[00:11.19]I woke up I ain't see nobody
[00:13.31]
[00:14.05]In my bed in my bed
[00:16.51]After all that I love you
[00:19.32]You ain't state what I did tell me what I did
[00:22.16]
[00:23.36]F**k that Rolls-Royce ooh
[00:25.46]I just wanna lose this cold heart ooh
[00:28.21]I just wanna say I apologize
[00:31.15]For all of the things I put you through
[00:34.11]Baby I done ran that money all up
[00:36.40]These h*es mistreated me and baby you can't fault them no no
[00:40.64]Tell me why you left me on my own own
[00:43.44]Them hitters coming just ring the alarm let's go
[00:46.23]Anger ran 'em all off feelings made 'еm just go
[00:49.03]Life on line in the North and I'm sittin' hеre mad 'bout a ho
[00:51.88]Who been chosen it with me and I can't sit and just watch
[00:54.73]I wasted time don't give a f**k bout no clock these diamonds crushed
[00:57.07]They just rocks
[00:57.61]That's a double-R Rolls-Royce Range Rover
[01:00.94]Really rich rock star high as f**k hangover
[01:03.81]Let you come and f**k me 'til my pain over okay
[01:06.56]Respect that girl so much don't won't no motherf**kin' brain from her
[01:09.71]Lean lean c*****e and my child
[01:12.24]That's all I want that's all I need and plus some money and my Glock
[01:15.35]Passport get overseas I can buy another foreign car
[01:18.06]Can buy a b***h to feed my needs can't buy another slime heart
[01:20.91]I woke up I ain't see nobody
[01:23.64]In my bed in my bed
[01:26.27]After all that I love you
[01:29.32]You ain't state what I did tell me what I did
[01:31.92]
[01:32.65]It's a panoramic four seater
[01:34.29]Never let me go I leave my h*es 'cause I don't need 'em
[01:37.34]Staring in your eyes tryna see potential like a soul seeker
[01:39.90]
[01:40.49]Lying in my eyes saying you love me you a cold creature
[01:43.26]F**k that s**t you said just leave 'cause I don't need you
[01:45.37]I'm gon' let that other n***a treat you
[01:46.76]My song playing loud through the speakers
[01:48.31]While you decide where to party at
[01:49.64]While you decide where to party at
[01:50.69]
[01:51.20]Leaving you never crossed my mind
[01:52.55]You wrong if you ever thought of that
[01:54.02]Now you call I ain't ever calling back
[01:55.60]No
[01:55.77]
[01:56.59]I'm staying strong now don't worry about me
[01:58.84]Things that you did I'll never forget
[02:01.17]
[02:02.37]If you keep it real you can get the world out me
[02:04.40]We can share it all to me it don't mean s**t
[02:06.78]
[02:07.82]F**k that Rolls-Royce ooh
[02:10.10]I just wanna lose this cold heart ooh
[02:12.96]I just wanna say I apologize
[02:15.93]For all of the things I put you through
[02:18.73]Baby I done ran that money all up
[02:21.14]These h*es mistreated me and baby you can't fault them no no
[02:25.30]Tell me why you left me on my own own
[02:28.11]Them hitters coming just ring the alarm let's go
data.trans:
[ti:Sincerely (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Sincerely, Kentrell (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.57]//
[00:03.15]Dmac制作
[00:04.28]我醒来以后 我醒来以后 我没有看见任何人
[00:05.56]Uncle Cameron制作
[00:07.00]
[00:08.70]有时候 我甚至不想说话
[00:09.83]
[00:11.19]我醒来以后 我没有看见任何人
[00:13.31]
[00:14.05]躺在我的床上
[00:16.51]毕竟我深爱着你
[00:19.32]你不用陈述我做过的事 请告诉我我做过什么
[00:22.16]
[00:23.36]对劳斯莱斯不屑一顾
[00:25.46]我只想让这颗冰冷的心消失
[00:28.21]我只想说我很抱歉
[00:31.15]我让你经历了很多痛苦
[00:34.11]宝贝 我已经把钱挥霍一空
[00:36.40]这些女人对我不好 宝贝 你不能指责她们
[00:40.64]告诉我你为什么抛下我独自一人
[00:43.44]这些枪手只是敲响警钟 让我们出发吧
[00:46.23]愤怒让他们落荒而逃 情绪让他们一走了之
[00:49.03]在北边过着命悬一线的生活 我坐在这里为一个女人疯狂
[00:51.88]她与我一起做出选择 我不能坐视不管
[00:54.73]我虚掷光阴 对时间不屑一顾 这些钻石支离破碎
[00:57.07]它们只是石头而已
[00:57.61]劳斯莱斯 路虎揽胜 我应有尽有
[01:00.94]腰缠万贯 炙手可热的明星 嗨到不能自已 宿醉未醒
[01:03.81]让你与我纵享激情 直到我的痛苦消失殆尽 好吧
[01:06.56]好好尊重那个女孩 她头脑简单
[01:09.71]特调饮料和我的孩子
[01:12.24]这是我想要的一切 这是我需要的一切 此外还有大把钞票和我的格洛克枪
[01:15.35]拿着护照飞去国外 我可以买下另一辆进口车
[01:18.06]可以拿钱收买一个女人满足我的需求 却买不到一颗真诚的心
[01:20.91]我醒来以后 我没有看见任何人
[01:23.64]躺在我的床上
[01:26.27]毕竟我深爱着你
[01:29.32]你不用陈述我做过的事 请告诉我我做过什么
[01:31.92]
[01:32.65]这是一辆全景式的四座豪车
[01:34.29]绝对不会放开我 我离开我的妹子 因为我不需要她们
[01:37.34]凝视着你的眼睛 试图像灵魂窥探者一样发现潜力
[01:39.90]
[01:40.49]我把将谎言看在眼里 嘴上说着你爱我 你冷酷无情
[01:43.26]对你说的话嗤之以鼻 赶紧离开 因为我不需要你
[01:45.37]我会让其他人好好招待你
[01:46.76]音响里传出我震耳欲聋的歌声
[01:48.31]当你决定举行派对地点
[01:49.64]当你决定举行派对地点
[01:50.69]
[01:51.20]我从未想过离你而去
[01:52.55]如果你有过离开的念头 那你就大错特错了
[01:54.02]现在你联系我 可我不会给你回电话
[01:55.60]//
[01:55.77]
[01:56.59]现在我十分坚强 不必为我担忧
[01:58.84]我不会忘记你的所做所为
[02:01.17]
[02:02.37]如果你保持真实 你可以让我敞开心扉
[02:04.40]我们可以分享一切 对我来说 一切都毫无意义
[02:06.78]
[02:07.82]对劳斯莱斯不屑一顾
[02:10.10]我只想让这颗冰冷的心消失
[02:12.96]我只想说我很抱歉
[02:15.93]我让你经历了很多痛苦
[02:18.73]宝贝 我已经把钱挥霍一空
[02:21.14]这些女人对我不好 宝贝 你不能指责她们
[02:25.30]告诉我你为什么抛下我独自一人
[02:28.11]这些枪手只是敲响警钟 让我们出发吧
